# LOCALIZATION::GET_CURRENT_LANGUAGE

## Summary
Used to check the language/region of the current player

## Returns
* **LANGUAGE_TYPE**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the selected language of the player profile

0 = american (en-US)
1 = french (fr-FR)
2 = german (de-DE)
3 = italian (it-IT)
4 = spanish (es-ES)
5 = brazilian (pt-BR)
6 = polish (pl-PL)
7 = russian (ru-RU)
8 = korean (ko-KR)
9 = chinesetrad (zh-TW)
10 = japanese (ja-JP)
11 = mexican (es-MX)
12 = chinesesimp (zh-CN)
